nodes.text: Hutt punch was a Hutt beverage. When serving Agent Alexsandr Kallus of the Imperial Security Bureau emerald wine aboard the Lawbringer, Captain Hiram Zataire commented that despite Lothal's greenness, its grapes "were as sour as Hutt punch." Later, he stated that he wouldn't dare to serve a man of Kallus's standing the "local Hutt punch" when Kallus called him out on the Emerald wine being not from Lothal, but rather from the Organa Ranch on Alderaan.
